class.name: MountainBike
class.brief: Mountain bike implementation of a transport::Bicycle.
class.doc: MountainBike is an implementation of a transport::Bicycle providing a bike for cycling on rough terrain. Mountain bikes are pretty cool because they have stuff like **Suspension** (and you can even adjust it using SetSuspension). If you're looking for a bike for use on the road, you might be better off using a transport::RacingBike though.

methodtemplate.name: ChangeBreak
methodtemplate.doc: ChangesBreak changes the type of break fitted to the bike. The method will return false if the break type could not be fitted.

return.doc: true if the break was adjusted successfully. false otherise

method.name: SetSuspension
method.doc: SetSuspension changes the stiffness of the suspension on the bike. The method will return false if the stiffness could not be adjusted.

return.doc: true if the suspension was adjusted successfully, false otherwise.
